params._template: Auction template to create an auction.

createMarket(uint256,address,uint256,add.details: Initializes auction with the parameters passed.

params._data: Data to be sent to template on Init.
params._integratorFeeAccount: Address to send refferal bonus, if set.
params._templateId: Id of the auction template to create.
params._token: The token address to be sold.
params._tokenSupply: Amount of tokens to be sold at market.

params._integratorFeeAccount: Address to pay the fee to.
params._templateId: Id of the crowdsale template to create.

returns._0: Address of the required template ID.
ID of the required template address.
bool True if the account has the role or false if it does not

params._accessControls: Sets address to get the access controls from.

removeAuctionTemplate(uint256).details: Function to remove an auction template.Should have operator access.

params._templateId: Refers to template that is to be deleted.
The ID of the current template for that type

AuctionTemplateAdded(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when template is added to factory.

AuctionTemplateRemoved(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when auction template is removed.

MarketCreated(address,address,address).notice: Event emitted when auction is created using template id.

MisoInitMarket(address).notice: Event emitted when first initializing the Market factory.

accessControls().notice: Responsible for access rights to the contract.

addAuctionTemplate(address).notice: Function to add an auction template to create through factory.

auctionInfo(address).notice: Mapping from auction created through this contract to Auction struct.

auctionTemplateId().notice: Template id to track respective auction template.

deployMarket(uint256,address).notice: Creates a new MISOMarket from template _templateId and transfers fees.

getAuctionTemplate(uint256).notice: Get the address based on template ID.

getTemplateId(address).notice: Get the ID based on template address.

hasMarketMinterRole(address).notice: Used to check whether an address has the minter role

initMISOMarket(address,address,address[].notice: Initializes the market with a list of auction templates.

locked().notice: Contract locked status. If locked, only minters can deploy

marketFees().notice: Minimum fee to create a farm through the factory.

misoDiv().notice: Any donations if set are sent here.

numberOfAuctions().notice: Get the total number of auctions in the factory.

setCurrentTemplateId(uint256,uint256).notice: Sets the current template ID for any type.

setLocked(bool).notice: Sets the factory to be locked or unlocked.
